an4.43:4.3: Kodhagaru na saddhammagaru, makkhagaru na saddhammagaru, lābhagaru na saddhammagaru, sakkāragaru na saddhammagaru.
an4.43:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.43:5.1: Cattārome, bhikkhave, puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an4.43:5.3: Saddhammagaru na kodhagaru, saddhammagaru na makkhagaru, saddhammagaru na lābhagaru, saddhammagaru na sakkāragaru.
an4.43:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasminti.
